title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 103.2 - Counsel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 103.2 - Counsel

State Regulations
A party may be represented by counsel; provided, however, that said counsel shall be a member of the bar of the State of New York in good
standing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
103.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
